scripts.kitty-directives: kitty +runpy 'from kitty.config import option_names_for_completion; import json; print(json.dumps(option_names_for_completion(), indent=2))'
scripts.kitty-actions: kitty +runpy 'from kitty.options.utils import func_with_args; import json; print(json.dumps(list(func_with_args.args_funcs.keys()), indent=2))'
